title: The Fatheads
description: Follow the daily lives of Mr. and Mrs. Fathead, a loudmouthed couple who love to argue and hate solicitors.
altHero: cartoon characters the Fatheads, a lumpy man and woman both with huge, off-putting smiles
alt1: the Fatheads taking their pet fly on a walk, both holding parking meters
alt2: Mrs. Fathead using her parking meter to feed a girl scout to Mr. Fathead whose mouth is open unnaturally wide
alt3: the Fatheads gritting their teeth and gripping their parking meters as they look at a wrinkly, crooked-toothed wallaby in a patterned shirt
alt4: a closeup of Mr. Fathead eyeball which has been shattered like glass and a little man in a nightgown and holding an old-timey candle pokes his head out
